content:
Sure, here are two slow cooker recipes along with the ingredients required for each recipe. I've also created a single shopping list table for both recipes sorted by section of the grocery store.

---

Recipe 1: Slow Cooker Beef Stew
===============================

Ingredients
-----------

* 2 lbs beef stew meat
* 4 cups beef broth
* 1 large onion, diced
* 4 garlic cloves, minced
* 4 carrots, peeled and sliced
* 2 celery stalks, sliced
* 2 potatoes, peeled and cubed
* 1 tsp dried thyme
* 1 tsp dried rosemary
* 1 tsp salt
* 1/2 tsp black pepper

Instructions
------------

1. Add all the ingredients to the slow cooker.
2. Stir to combine.
3. Cook on low for 8 hours.
4. Serve hot.

Recipe 2: Slow Cooker Chicken Tacos
===================================

Ingredients
-----------

* 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breasts
* 1 can diced tomatoes with green chilies
* 1 onion, diced
* 2 garlic cloves, minced
* 1 bell pepper, diced
* 1 jalapeno, diced
* 1 tsp chili powder
* 1 tsp cumin
* 1 tsp paprika
* 1/2 tsp salt
* 1/4 tsp black pepper
* Corn tortillas, for serving
* Shredded cheese, for serving
* Sour cream, for serving
* Cilantro, for serving

Instructions
------------

1. Add the chicken breasts, diced tomatoes, onion, garlic, bell pepper, jalapeno, chili powder, cumin, paprika, salt, and black pepper to the slow cooker.
2. Stir to combine.
3. Cook on low for 6 hours.
4. Shred the chicken with two forks.
5. Serve with corn tortillas, shredded cheese, sour cream, and cilantro.

---

Shopping List
=============

| Section | Ingredient | Quantity | Have |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Meat/Seafood | Beef stew meat | 2 lbs |  |
|  | Chicken breasts | 1 lb |  |
| Produce | Onion | 2 | [x] |
|  | Garlic cloves | 6 | [x] |
|  | Carrots | 4 |  |
|  | Celery stalks | 2 |  |
|  | Potatoes | 2 | [x] |
|  | Bell pepper | 1 |  |
|  | Jalapeno | 1 |  |
|  | Cilantro | 1 bunch |  |
| Dairy | Shredded cheese | 1 cup | [x] |
|  | Sour cream | 1 cup |  |
| Pantry | Beef broth | 4 cups |  |
|  | Diced tomatoes | 1 can |  |
|  | Chili powder | 1 tsp |  |
|  | Cumin | 1 tsp |  |
|  | Paprika | 1 tsp |  |
|  | Salt | 1.5 tsp |  |
|  | Black pepper | 3/4 tsp |  |
|  | Corn tortillas | 12 |  |

Note: [x] indicates items you've said you already have.
